mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_FAQ 목록 조회 (FaqMapper.selectMenuList) */ SELECT faq_sn ,task_se_cd ,faq_clsf ,faq_ttl ,faq_seq ,use_yn ,lang_se_cd ,faq_ans ,atch_file_id ,wrtr_dept_nm ,mdfr_dept_nm ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_FAQ" WHERE 1=1 AND faq_sn = #{faqSn}
